data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Epuraea Erichson, 1843 from China (Coleoptera, Nitidulidae, Epuraeinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhao, Mengjiao, Huang, Min, Yang, Xingke, Kirejtshuk, Alexander G. (2014): Two new species of the genus Epuraea Erichson, 1843 from China (Coleoptera, Nitidulidae, Epuraeinae). ZooKeys 445: 107-115, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.445.7163, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.445.7163
